definition: character size/font size/fame/reputation/shop/name of a shop
characters and numbers (as used in a code)/alphanumeric code/serial number
letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people
shop, firm, or brand of merchandise with a long-established reputation

sentences.english: Used to take the place of hyphen in many occasions when finer typography is required.
sentences.chinese: 很多時，配合精細的排字要求，就用它來代替連字號。

sentences.english: The name of a public offering foundation may not use a trade name.
sentences.chinese: 公募基金會的名稱可以不使用字號。

sentences.english: Mass production has brought many old trades to an end.
sentences.chinese: 許多老字號商行都敗給了大規模生產。

sentences.english: The hundred years old company welcomed visitants on that day.
sentences.chinese: 百年老字號，在這天迎來了貴賓。

sentences.english: Hyphens are just used to separate the hexadecimal digits for the sake of clarity.
sentences.chinese: 連字號純粹爲了清晰的緣故而把十六進制數字分開。

sentences.english: But now seem, there is still a lot of name could not find a way home.
sentences.chinese: 但是現在看來，還是有很多老字號找不到回家的路了。

sentences.english: Wan Sheng Rice Firm is an old and famous rice shop, founded in early 1911.
sentences.chinese: 萬盛米行是一間老字號米鋪，始建於民國初年。

sentences.english: headlines have the font size between 17 and 25px.
sentences.chinese: 大標題的字號介於17至25像素之間。

sentences.english: The company was founded in 1998, is old inspection company.
sentences.chinese: 本公司成立於1998年，是老字號的報檢公司。

sentences.english: Words are broken and hyphenated according to standard grammar rules.
sentences.chinese: 文字會根據標準文法規則斷字並加上連字號。

sentences.english: Affected by the market-oriented economy, Laozihao are taking the shine off.
sentences.chinese: 受到市場經濟的影響，老字號的招牌正在褪減。

sentences.english: Diyang foodstuff is a honored enterprise with twenty-years history and a famous brand.
sentences.chinese: 帝洋食品是二十多年老字號，老品牌。

sentences.english: In conclusion, Laozihao is the carrier of the traditional culture and arts.
sentences.chinese: 總結，老字號是傳統文化和藝術的載體。

sentences.english: Always keeping target user segment in mind while deciding the font-size.
sentences.chinese: 綜合考慮目標用戶的特點，確定字號。

sentences.english: These four men were known under this title.
sentences.chinese: 這四個人是用這個字號露面的。

sentences.english: "We should also look to our organizational problems when talking about the national team's poor performance," Wei said at his first news conference since taking the job.
sentences.chinese: 韋迪表示，國字號成績如此之差，有足協組織的問題。

definition: shop, firm, or brand of merchandise with a long-established reputation
passed on from ancestors/handed down from generation to generation
old property (esp. inherited from former generation)/former territory
Xin'an county in Luoyang 洛陽|洛阳, Henan
